record.value: May be null when unknown service is invoked.
May be null when unknown service is invoked.

SEQUENCE.NAME: $null
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: If the error event has come from Utils.Exception.processENTError', ignore the exception even.

EXIT.COMMENT: Exit the flow with SUCCESS signal.

MAP.COMMENT: Map the entire pipeline values to SmartEDI.common.Exception.Document:doc_ShowError

record.value: May be null when unknown service is invoked.

MAP.COMMENT: Set the error dump values for logging to error.log file

Values.value: ServiceName: %ShowError/ShowError/DataArea/Error/ServiceName% InterfaceName: %ShowError/ShowError/DataArea/Error/InterfaceName% ErrorCode: %ShowError/ShowError/DataArea/Error/ErrorCode% DocumentId: %ShowError/ShowError/DataArea/Error/DocumentId% SourceSystem: %ShowError/ShowError/DataArea/Error/SourceSystem% TargetSystem: %ShowError/ShowError/DataArea/Error/TargetSystem% SenderId: %ShowError/ShowError/DataArea/Error/SenderId% ReceiverId: %ShowError/ShowError/DataArea/Error/ReceiverId% PointOfOccurance:%ShowError/ShowError/DataArea/Error/PointOfOccurance% Severity: %ShowError/ShowError/DataArea/Error/Severity% Error: %ShowError/ShowError/DataArea/Error/lastError/error% Error Type: %ShowError/ShowError/DataArea/Error/lastError/errorType%

INVOKE.COMMENT: Log the exception event to 'error.log' file

record.value: May be null when unknown service is invoked.

INVOKE.COMMENT: Publish the ShowError document to ES_IS Broker
Clear pipeline. Preserve 'ShowError' in out pipeline.

EXIT.COMMENT: Exit the flow with SUCCESS signal.

Values.value: Service Name: SmartEDI.Common.Exception:ENTErrorHandlerBroker Error: Null pointer exception Error Type: %lastError/errorType% Point Of Occurance:%lastError/service% User: %lastError/user% Error Dump:%lastError/errorDump%

Service Name: SmartEDI.Common.Exception:ENTErrorHandlerBroker Error: %lastError/error% Error Type: %lastError/errorType% Point Of Occurance:%lastError/service% User: %lastError/user% Error Dump:%lastError/errorDump%

INVOKE.COMMENT: Log the error to error.log file

record.value: May be null when unknown service is invoked.

INVOKE.COMMENT: Get the mailHost and e_mail address

Values.value:
>> Error Report <<
Date/Time: %lastError/time%
Server: %serverName%:%port%
Service Name: SmartEDI.Common.Exception:ENTErrorHandlerBroker
Error: %lastError/error%
Error Type: %lastError/errorType%
Service: %lastError/service%
User: %lastError/user%
Error Dump: %lastError/errorDump%
Please check error.log file for further details.
Please do not reply to this mail. This mail is system generated.

INVOKE.COMMENT: Clear pipeline. Preserve 'lastError' in out pipeline.

EXIT.COMMENT: Exit the flow with FAILURE flag.
